segments.text: You guys are charging me $ 10 for a movie that I never ordered or saw .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's see , sir . According to your file , you watched ' Titanic ' Monday evening .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , the wrong information is in my file . I was at a concert Monday night .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , your word overrules the file , sir . One moment , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I knew you'd see it my way .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sir , I deleted the $ 10 , but I had to add a $ 2 service charge to your bill .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Am I in the Twilight Zone ? You're charging me for a movie I never saw ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please don't blame me , sir . Blame the computer programmer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is highway robbery . I've got a good mind to call the police !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If it makes you feel any better , other guests feel the same way .
segments.speaker: S2
